textBox.richText: For the 7th semester students whose semester ends in 10 weeks, here is the evaluation guideline: you will have 3 tests (like all the other students), and each test counts for 20%. Because you have 5 weeks less (1/3 of the semester), your maximum point will not be 100%; the maximum of the total point will be 60%. The grade will be based on the chart I gave you at the beginning of the semester.
